thread.title_full: Special Guitar: This Is The Guitar John Frusciante Gave To RHCP's Josh Klinghoffer [News]

title: Special Guitar: This Is The Guitar John Frusciante Gave To RHCP's Josh Klinghoffer [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 12 hours ago 5 Red Hot Chili Peppers guitar tech Ian Sheppard recently presented a rather special instrument in Josh Klinghoffer's arsenal, the guitar he was given by none-other than his predecessor, Mr. John Frusciante.
As the tech explained to Premier Guitar , we are looking at a classic 1967 Fender Tele Custom with sunburst finish John used as his backup guitar. 
You might notice the gaff tape on the six-string's body; turns out it was put there by Frusciante because he used to often scrape his arm at that spot. 
Anyhow, you can check out a photo of the guitar below, along with Josh jamming it live in concert during " Parallel Universe ."
